sourcesContent:
<template lang='pug'>
  #app
    .box {{ data[0] }}
    .box {{ data[1] }}
</template>

<script>
const axios = require('axios')
import HelloWorld from './components/HelloWorld.vue'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  data () {
    return {
      data: [],
      sources: [
        'https://www.cbr-xml-daily.ru/daily_utf8.xml',
        'https://www.cbr-xml-daily.ru/daily_json.js'
      ]
    }
  },
  components: {
    HelloWorld
  },
  mounted: function() {
    const self = this;
    const source = this.sources.map(function(source) {
      return source
    });

    axios.all(
      self.sources.map(source => {
        axios
          .get(source)
          .then(res => {
            self.data.push(res.data)
          })
      })
    )
  }
}
</script>

<style lang='stylus'>
#app
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale
  text-align: center
  color: #2c3e50
  margin-top: 60px

.box
  margin: 40px 0
  background #EEEEEE
</style>
